name: GKARC4RandomSource
desc: A basic random number generator implementing the ARC4 algorithm, which is suitable for most gameplay mechanics.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a random source from a nondeterministic seed.

items.name: init(seed: Data)
items.desc: Initializes a random source with the specified seed data.

items.name: var seed: Data
items.desc: The seed data that determines the random sourceâ€™s behavior.

items.name: func dropValues(Int)
items.desc: Skips the specified number of values in the random sequence.
